locutie.beschrijving: The sermon explores the theological significance of the human body, the reality of the Incarnation against Gnosticism, and the physical nature of Christ's resurrection.
locutie.exegetische_kwaliteit: High. The preacher provides historical context on Gnosticism and linguistic roots (in carno), connecting 1 John and Luke effectively.

illocutie.beschrijving: Primarily asserting the truth of the Incarnation and the value of bodies, transitioning into a promise of shared resurrection.
voorbeelden: The message is clear: God’s life has appeared in the world in Jesus Christ.
The test of true Christian faith is the claim that the Son of God took on human flesh.
For us he has been raised out of the grave.

perlocutie.beoogd_effect: Comfort in mortality, validation of physical existence, and faith in the victory of Christ over death.
perlocutie.pneumatologisch_bewustzijn: Low. The Spirit is mentioned as a topic of 'testing the spirits' but not explicitly invoked as the agent of the sermon's efficacy.

voorbeelden: The New Testament church found itself in the midst of a society...
Jesus didn’t just come and inhabit a human body for a while.
Let us in heart and mind embrace the wounded hands.
My friend wept even more uncontrollably.
We might be amazed at the gesture.
So we shall be united with him in his Resurrection.
He has won the definitive and final victory.
commissieven.kwaliteit: Strong but often framed as a general theological truth (Assertive) rather than a direct personal promise (Commissive).

declaratieven.autoriteit: The preacher acts as a witness/herald rather than a sacramental agent of change.

indicatoren: Sociological observations on cremation and health clubs.
Third-person descriptions of 'The Hebrew mind' and 'The New Testament message'.
constatief_surplus_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: The hearer is well-informed about the doctrine of the body but remains an observer of the truth rather than a participant in it until the very end.

missende_elementen: Direct address of the promise to the 'you' in the pews earlier in the text
performatief_deficit_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: Intellectual assent to the Resurrection without the immediate 'event' of being raised by the Word.

toezegging_check.kwaliteit_toezeggen: The 'Toezegging' is present but late, functioning as a concluding application rather than the sermon's engine.
voorbeelden: For us he has been raised out of the grave.
So also shall we be united with him in his Resurrection.

eerste_persoon.gebruik: Mostly 'we' (inclusive of preacher and congregation) or 'I' (anecdotal).

tweede_persoon.gebruik: Used to address the reader/hearer's struggles at the end.
tweede_persoon.performatieve_context: Used in the final paragraph to apply the victory of Christ.

derde_persoon.distantie_effect: Creates a lecture-like atmosphere for the first 70% of the text.

actueel_present.gebruik: The 'now' of the proclamation in the final paragraph.

foutief_patroon.beschrijving: It avoids pure moralism (Directive), but stays long in Assertive.

sacramenteel_patroon.beschrijving: Assertive (Body matters) -> Declarative (Christ is raised) -> Commissive (We shall be raised).
voorbeelden: The victory of the Resurrection is enacted over and over again... That includes you and me.
sacramenteel_patroon.kwaliteit: The pattern is sound but the 'Assertive' phase is disproportionately long.

voorbeelden_goede_verhouding: For us he has been raised... let us embrace.

diagnostische_evaluatie.diagnose_toelichting: The sermon is a brilliant theological essay on the Incarnation that only becomes a 'sacramental event' in its final movements.

sterke_punten.effect: Provides a solid intellectual foundation for faith.

zwakke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: The long section on health clubs and cremation.
zwakke_punten.probleem: Delays the encounter with the living Christ.

diagnostische_evaluatie.gebeuren_toelichting: It feels like a 'talk about' God for the majority, only becoming a 'happening' in the Birmingham/Civil Rights application.
diagnostische_evaluatie.sacramentele_toelichting: The preacher acts more as a teacher of doctrine than a distributor of the 'Word-as-Sacrament'.

openbaringsleer.god_als_spreker: Implicitly, through the text, but the preacher's voice dominates.
openbaringsleer.prediker_als_mandataris: Moderate. The preacher speaks as an authorized teacher.
tekstueel_bewijs: That which we have seen and heard we proclaim also to you.

pneumatologie.perlocutie_theologie: Not explicitly stated; the focus is on the objective reality of the body.
tekstueel_bewijs: By this you know the Spirit of God.

sacramentstheologie.preek_als_genademiddel: The sermon treats the Word as a carrier of truth more than a creative force.
tekstueel_bewijs: At this moment as we are gathered for the proclamation of this message...

specifieke_suggesties.huidige_formulering: The message is clear: God’s life has appeared in the world.
specifieke_suggesties.voorgestelde_revisie: Today, God brings His life to you in this very room.
specifieke_suggesties.verschil: Moves from a historical report to a present encounter.

toezegging_versterking.probleem: The promise is buried in the conclusion.
toezegging_versterking.suggestie: Interweave the promise of the body's value throughout the cultural analysis.
voorbeeldzinnen: Christ does not just have a body; He claims your body today.

adressering_verbetering.suggestie: Use 'you' to implicate the hearer in the Gnostic temptation.
voorbeeldzinnen: You often feel your body is a prison, but Christ calls it a temple.

indicatief_imperatief_herstel.probleem: The balance is actually good, just slow to arrive.
indicatief_imperatief_herstel.suggestie: Accelerate the move to the indicative of grace.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A deeply thoughtful sermon that honors the physical reality of the faith, but could benefit from more 'illocutionary fire' to match its high 'locutionary light'.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_schulz_von_thun: SvT would focus on the preacher's 'self-revelation' (the friend's story); SAT focuses on the 'Declarative' power of the Resurrection word.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retoriek: Rhetoric seeks to persuade the hearer that bodies matter; SAT seeks to perform the act of God's claim on the hearer's body.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_SAT: SAT reveals that the sermon's 'event-character' is hampered by a surplus of third-person historical assertives.

kernzinnen_analyse.zin: For us he has been raised out of the grave.
kernzinnen_analyse.effectiviteit: The turning point where the sermon becomes an event.

appendices.notities: The sermon is intellectually rigorous but homiletically 'safe' until the final third.
